div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h2: Welcome to the Sanford School Department
div.h4: Sanford Schools are closed at least until May 1, 2020. Our district is utilizing distance learning during this time period to minimize the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19). We are taking this proactive approach out of an abundance of caution and in an effort to “flatten the curve” of COVID-19 cases in Maine.

img.alt: Free and Reduced Meals and COVID-19

h3.a: Free and Reduced Meals and COVID-19

div.p: Families affected by the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic shutdown may be eligible for free and reduced-priced school meals based on their current income. Free and reduced price meal benefits will carry...
